attributes.action: Raise a petition to change the law regarding the trials of NI veterans.
attributes.additional_details: This will require a change in the law.
attributes.background:
Stop the unilateral retrials of military personnel who served in NI. They have been tried previously.
The UK Government has handed letters to PIRA terrorists saying they will not be pursued for their crimes and others were released from prison early.
Treat both sides equally.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553519
